question: Some people think the most important thing about being rich is helpingother people. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
text: In recent times,more and more people are becoming wealthy due to expanding globalization, but the most effective wealthy person is assumed to be one who facilitates others at the time of need.Although many might disagree with this statement ,I completely agree with this notion,not only because of dependence among communities and cultural growth but also because of the sense of well being before God.This essay will explore how these factors justify my opinion.

Firstly,the factor that compelled me to agree with this statement is the phenomenon of mutual dependence among societies.As it is the norms and customs of several nations that  well-off people tend to help and support each other to the needy part of the community.Take an example of South Africa,where hundreds of rich people donated billions of money for the welfare of poor ones during the time of crisis.Thus,interdependence  is a vital factor in societies.

Secondly,it is considered to be one of the positive trends in several cultures that wealthy people cooperate and assist the poverty-stricken people at the time of need.As this activity will promote  peace and equality among people as there will be no deprived person in society.For instance,during the cultural revolution in Kenya,high incomed people participated a lot in cultural activities which resulted in,not only support of needy but also promotion of cultural values.Hence.helping others is considered to be one of the key factors in cultural growth.

Finally,almost every community across the world have faith in God.As facilitation of poor and needy will lead to a  feeling of contentment and satisfaction which cannot be described in words,so betterment of people is merely possible if rich help the poor.
To sum up,I believe that I completely agree with this statement,not only because of reliance on each other and social growth but also because of a  feeling of self-esteem after doing such activity.
